rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Farmworkers face some of the most intense exposures to the bird flu virus, but advocates say many of them would lack resources to fall back on if they became ill.

rationale: The segment uses an intensifier ('intense') but it modifies a neutral noun ('exposures'), not a harm noun.
statement_text: Farmworkers face some of the most intense exposures to the bird flu virus, but advocates say many of them would lack resources to fall back on if they became ill.
Farmworkers face some of the most intense exposures to the bird flu virus, but advocates say many of them would lack resources to fall back on if they became ill.
